text: Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 48. Should any bhikkhunī depart on a journey without having forfeited her dwelling space, it is to be confessed. [See Bhikkhus' Pācittiya 15]
